name: Escape Of The Samurai!
description:
--> ESCAPE OF THE SAMURAI! <--

You've been trapped inside a game as a samurai with 15 levels spread throughout 3 worlds. You need to beat all 15 levels, to escape, however many deadly traps is found on your way!

CONTROLS:

  • W.A.S.D / ARROW KEYS - Movement
  • Space / Left Click- Attack
  • SHIFT - Dash
  • E - Interact

NOTES

This is my second public game, so I hope you enjoy. I would also really appreciate it if you could give me feedback for it!

This game takes about 15 minutes long for new players, although may take longer or shorter depending on your skill.

* EXPECT TO FIND BUGS *

CREDITS

All visual elements are drawn and designed by me and William Hedegaard Thomsen as well as the music, however the sound effects are from online sources.

- Jump sound by dklon - https://opengameart.org/content/platformer-jumping-sounds
